Name: Kiting Mechanics
About the game: Kiting Mechanics was built by an army of two botlane connoisseurs who wanted to have a tool to get in the groove of kiting and dodging skillshots before their games. We made sure every aspect of the game feels and performs the same as the real deal, so training here means getting good out there. Kite Develop reliable kiting skills by practicing in tough situations that will make teamfighting feel like a walk in the park. Dodge Build some strong anticipation and make sidestepping second nature. In Kiting Mechanics you will roam around a vast map where you must capture forts defended by hordes of mobs to get to the next round. Along the way you will pick up some juicy perks to spice up your run and get as far as possible in the ranking. Your micro will thank you.
